CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter your justification for requesting a “Short Term Project”. The Open Offer defines a Short Term Project as ‘a project or circumstance giving rise to a discrete purchase of Sequencing Consumables outside of ongoing ordinary course of purchases made by a For-Profit Entity. The duration of a Short Term Project is no more than two years. (Please note this flag triggers additional reviews to verify Short Term Project applicability)
CustomField.label: Open Offer Discount Exception Request
